Extract Riesz representer weights

Source: R/ei_riesz.R
weights.ei_riesz.Rd

Extracts a single set of Riesz representer weights from an ei_riesz object, for a selected group.

Usage

# S3 method for class 'ei_riesz'
weights(object, group = TRUE, loo = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

object

An ei_riesz() object.

group

The group for which to extract the weights, as a numeric index or a character column name. The special (default) value TRUE will return a matrix of weights, with each column corresponding to a group.

loo

If TRUE, return the leave-one-out weights

...

Additional arguments (ignored)

Value

A numeric vector of weights

On this page
